name: Spawnhood
description:
Our game teaches us that raising up a hell spawn is not as easy as it seems. Can you keep up with it's daily routines and make it grown into a Hell Raising Demon of Hell that you know and love, knock yourself out.

Worst wishes,

Jammed Game Team

Nikola Dragojlović - game design

Miloš Manojlović - 3D artist
Suzana Miladinov - 2D artist
Miša Jovanović - programmer
Đorđe Cvijić - programmer
Žarko Goronja - sound

Thanks to HorrorPen for lovely music :)

https://opengameart.org/users/horrorpen
